channel.title: Luzoxpk returns 317 || Pking Server || 317/634/718
channel.description:
Dear moparscape users,
I have reopened LuzoxPk after fixing several dupes, and bugs we now have full control over the wilderness and want you guys to test it out for more possible eco destroying bugs/exploits/dupes.
Everyone is welcome find economic destroying bugs/dupes or exploits you will be rewarded "Ingame" please note we have just opened and our playerbase is not so big yet so do not come online and say only 1-10 players online.
A little bit about the server the server is based on rs oldschool but then pking/pvming based pvming is a big part of making a bank best way to make a bank is with slayer or doing the stages there currently 15 stages and they contain skilling parts, the main sourc eof your money will be pking due to its a pking based server yes we do have some 634/718 items but that is just becaus players requested it. If you like the server please leave a coment and if you know what i should change or have suggestions post them under the suggestion form on the forums see link here: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/5ae8b31cc512b254e0d3b872fd4decdb.png[/img][url=http://luzoxpk.com/forum/index.php?board=25.0]Suggestions[/url].
What do we provide:
* Pking. * Pvming if you don't want to pk or skill. * Skilling if your bored or don't want to pvm. * Bank pins. * Completionist need all skills 99 to get it and wear it. * Barrows minigame. * Crystal key chest. (vote reward, and pvm drop) * Shiny key chest. (pvm drop) * Fully functional magic combat. (thanks to MGT MADNESS) * Dicing. * Boss stages. ([COLOR="#00FF00"]safe don't lose your items[/COLOR]) * Skilling stages. * Some 634/718 Items. (request by players) * Killstreaks. * New bank interface * Redskull command ([COLOR="#FF0000"]risk all your items on death[/COLOR]) * Nicely community * Primal weapons for Pking * Custom weapons * custom armour * And many more you will have to see ingame
Pking Commands:
::food
Player - Sharks heal 20
Donator - Manta rays heal 22
Super Donator + - Rocktails heal 24
::skull
::unskull
::redskull
Media:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/dea3f6ad61b9c0ab50e8339bb33d98b5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/e0310fe2935862c82f090b28e88c0a23.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/b6f7faf3f3b17557702d4120d1a0f862.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/a5f54d7009355e375a6cfac5c27d2493.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/17cb7a43f42be3e8bb0048ef7e4c71d4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/c85405e29c07a36e2c54d98f3195d497.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/ab5c14fdaa436539fbfc9b4f06c427db.gif[/img]
Do you want to figure out how the other stages look like join us :)
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/3e47538323e723effae860b910b673a7.gif[/img]
Redskull pking command for high risking your items lose everything on death ([COLOR="#FF0000"]Cannot use protection prayer[/COLOR])
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/9725293128bc409716d67f521067177c.png[/img]
New bank interface
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/71329a5baa6064975a13c61a565b26c5.png[/img]
Bank pins secure your account against hackers.
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/7f176e70bfe64369a7245e9355ba89f8.png[/img]
prestige your account for several extra features (train) you can also chose for setting your combat levels due its a pk server
That was the media i can post tons of pictures but you will have to see that ingame.
Staff:
[IMG]http://i138.photobucket.com/albums/q259/Denibis/OwnerCrown.png[/img]Mod patrick (Owner)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uo7OzrF.png[/img]Kat (Server Support)
Links:
Webclient: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/da34cf3ab62d8244a9a99ec7d6f79b3f.png[/img][url=http://www.luzoxpk.com/Webclient]Webclient[/url]
Desktop Client: [IMG]http://gyazo.com/5a23e8b85c6ce41377c959a1a9c87ccc.png[/img][url=http://luzoxpk.com/luzoxpk.jar]Download Client[/url]
Forums: [IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/chat.png[/img][url=http://www.luzoxpk.com]Forums[/url]
vote: [IMG]https://cdn0.iconfinder.com/data/icons/30_Free_Black_ToolBar_Icons/40/Black_ThumbsUp.png[/img][url=http://luzoxpk.com/Vote/#?step=1]Vote[/url]
Credits and help:
Mgt Madness: 15% credits for helping me out Foreverpkers source: 30% credits for the base Zivik: 15% for helping me Ipkmills: 40% thinking and game updates

item.title: Luzoxpk returns 317 || Pking Server || 317/634/718
item.dc:creator: @luzoxpk luzoxpk
item.description:
@luzoxpk wrote:

Dear moparscape users,

I have reopened LuzoxPk after fixing several dupes, and bugs we now have full control over the wilderness and want you guys to test it out for more possible eco destroying bugs/exploits/dupes.

Everyone is welcome find economic destroying bugs/dupes or exploits you will be rewarded “Ingame” please note we have just opened and our playerbase is not so big yet so do not come online and say only 1-10 players online.

A little bit about the server the server is based on rs oldschool but then pking/pvming based pvming is a big part of making a bank best way to make a bank is with slayer or doing the stages there currently 15 stages and they contain skilling parts, the main sourc eof your money will be pking due to its a pking based server yes we do have some 634/718 items but that is just becaus players requested it.
If you like the server please leave a coment and if you know what i should change or have suggestions post them under the suggestion form on the forums see link here: Suggestions.

What do we provide:

  • Pking.
  • Pvming if you don’t want to pk or skill.
  • Skilling if your bored or don’t want to pvm.
  • Bank pins.
  • Completionist need all skills 99 to get it and wear it.
  • Barrows minigame.
  • Crystal key chest. (vote reward, and pvm drop)
  • Shiny key chest. (pvm drop)
  • Fully functional magic combat. (thanks to MGT MADNESS)
  • Dicing.
  • Boss stages. ([COLOR="#00FF00"]safe don’t lose your items[/COLOR])
  • Skilling stages.
  • Some 634/718 Items. (request by players)
  • Killstreaks.
  • New bank interface
  • Redskull command ([COLOR="#FF0000"]risk all your items on death[/COLOR])
  • Nicely community
  • Primal weapons for Pking
  • Custom weapons
  • custom armour
  • And many more you will have to see ingame

Pking Commands:

::food

Player - Sharks heal 20

Donator - Manta rays heal 22

Super Donator + - Rocktails heal 24

::skull

::unskull

::redskull

Media:

Do you want to figure out how the other stages look like join us

Redskull pking command for high risking your items lose everything on death ([COLOR="#FF0000"]Cannot use protection prayer[/COLOR])

New bank interface

Bank pins secure your account against hackers.

prestige your account for several extra features (train) you can also chose for setting your combat levels due its a pk server

That was the media i can post tons of pictures but you will have to see that ingame.
